title: Bug 44474StyledText does not handle case where printing not supported
description: StyledText$Printing() assumes that printer.getPrinterData will return a nonnull value.On machines where printing is not supported (or a printer is notinstalled) this is not true.Run TestorgeclipseswtcustomStyledText.testprint on GTK or Mac and youwill get an NPE.The test case and StyledText need to be modified to handle the case where noprinter or printing support is available.
